The signal amplification was investigated following a literature reported protocol.
54 Briefly, 100 μL solution of Au-ASO mix was first treated with RNA containing SARS-CoV-2 at a concentration of 1 ng/μL. This solution was then incubated with CTAB, l-ascorbic acid, and HAuCl 4 at a concentration of 0.1 M, 0.45 mM, and 0.225 mM, respectively, and monitored over several time points.
